title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain as a local LLM/Chat/Embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode, OpenAI-compatible endpoint).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal React-based chat UI served from a single static HTML file; no build step, talks to local Ollama.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with synchronous & async APIs, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; chat, generate, pull, list, copy, delete models.

title: ollama-hass-addon
summary: Home Assistant add-on to run Ollama inside HassOS for private voice/chat automations.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama model replies into any channel with slash commands.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation to build & run Ollama declaratively on NixOS (merged into nixpkgs).

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama CI steps (pull model, generate, embed) in any pipeline container.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/await bindings to Ollama REST API with tokio & serde.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library for Ollama with chat & generate endpoints, streaming IAsyncEnumerable, and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client for Ollama using std.http with compile-time JSON parsing; minimal dependencies.

title: ollama-deno
summary: Deno module exposing TypeScript-friendly Ollama client with fetch-based streaming.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server letting any MCP-capable IDE use Ollama models for inline chat & refactor.
